questions.questionText: For the relation Apply(SSN,cName,date,major) with functional dependency SSN,cName  â†’ date, what real-world constraint is captured by SSN ->-> cName,date?

options.option: A student can only apply to one major at each college.
A student can apply to different majors at each college, but each major must be applied for on a different date.
A student must apply to the same set of majors at all colleges.
A student must apply to a different major at each college.
